title: 103_s561
content: Child and Family Services and Law Enforcement Partnership Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants for the establishment of child and family services and law enforcement partnership programs. Directs the Secretary to give priority to partnerships that include a law enforcement agency engaged in community-based policing. Authorizes the Secretary to award additional grant amounts to enable a partnership to provide mentoring or conflict resolution services. Prescribes funding guidelines and partnership assurances. Authorizes appropriations.
